overview: Bizarre water starts attacking people. Miki, a fan of paranormal phenomenon, stands up to find out what's going on. Victims have one thing in common; try to catch Hekiru. While Miki protects her, the water attacks Reiko. Without Reiko's help, Miki and Hekiru get isolated. In the 11th hour Hekiru transforms into a monster. A man in black is watching Hekiru, now a monster, from a distance. The Self Defense Force attacks Hekiru.
title: Kigai (Paranormal Town) Vol. 1
